title: Alloying Ni4Mo for efficient alkaline hydrogen oxidation and hydrogen evolution reactions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1619-1625
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00179F, Communication
Pengfei Cao, Xinxin Zhang, Lei Wang, Honggang Fu
Alloying Ni4Mo nanoparticles grown on a reduced oxide graphite carrier could promote both hydrogen oxidation and hydrogen evolution reaction activity.
